name: EFreeGames
author: YourName
description: Tracks and announces free games from various digital storefronts including Epic Games, Steam, GOG, Humble Bundle, Itch.io, EA/Origin, and Ubisoft Connect.
install_msg: Thanks for installing EFreeGames! Use `[p]help efreegames` to get started. Make sure to configure your announcement channel with `[p]fg settings channel`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores configuration for game announcements and role pings per server. It also maintains a cache of previously announced games to prevent duplicates. No personal user data is stored.
